title: CRYSTAL DAO, LPC — Dallas Counseling & Treatment Center
author: Dallas Counseling; Treatment Center
description: Crystal specializes in treating adults and adolescents with anxiety, depression, life transitions, trauma, and PTSD. She has experience treating Bipolar Disorder, self-harm, and disordered eating.
cleaned_text: CRYSTAL DAO, MS, LPC Crystal specializes in treating adults and adolescents with anxiety, depression, life transitions, trauma, and PTSD. She has experience treating Bipolar Disorder, self-harm, and disordered eating. Crystal uses a combination of approaches to assist you in achieving your therapeutic goals. Crystal has a warm and engaging personality that helps her build a meaningful connection with you. She prioritizes helping you feel safe and supported as you embark on your healing journey. She is empathetic, attentive, and determined to help you become the best version of yourself. Crystal is a trauma-informed therapist with experience treating diverse populations, including the LGBTQ+ community. Education and Training Licensed Professional Counselor Masters Degree in Counseling, University of North Texas Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Acceptance and Commitment Therapy Dialectical Behavior Therapy Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR) Areas of Focus Anxiety Depression Trauma Life Transitions Disordered
